definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: Raindrops have splashed clay particles and organic matter into the furrows, further than the sand particles.
sentences.chinese: 降雨冲刷使粘土和有机物比沙粒更多的流入垄沟。

sentences.english: Description : Raindrops have splashed clay particles and organic matter into the furrows, further than the sand particles.
sentences.chinese: 降雨冲刷使粘土和有机物比沙粒更多的流入垄沟。

sentences.english: A similar trend of variation in sorption coefficients was observed.
sentences.chinese: 水溶性有机物的吸着系数也呈同样的递变趋势。

sentences.english: Their approach involves pyrolysis, decomposing organic material with heat in the absence of oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 他们通过在缺氧的环境下对有机物进行热分解。

sentences.english: The chemical oxygen demand is referred as important indicator of organic substance in water.
sentences.chinese: 化学需氧量是水体中有机物含量的重要指标。

sentences.english: This organic matter has been here about a month.
sentences.chinese: 这些有机物在这里已经接近一个月了。

sentences.english: Being made of organic substances, primitive boats were subject to corruption and they did not preserve.
sentences.chinese: 原始的舟船都是用有机物制成的，易腐难存。

sentences.english: and their produce is fresh and organic  so you're not getting pesticides.
sentences.chinese: 食物很新鲜，富含有机物，不会吃到农药。

sentences.english: The organic matter content of oversized compost in screen was higher than that of undersized compost in the maturity compost.
sentences.chinese: 腐熟垃圾堆肥筛分后的筛上物有机物含量高于筛下物。

sentences.english: Biodegradation. Can decompose to carbon dioxide, biomass and water.
sentences.chinese: 生物降解，可分解成二氧化碳，有机物和水。

sentences.english: Excess organics tax ozonation and foam fractionating systems.
sentences.chinese: 多余的有机物税臭氧和泡沫分馏系统。

sentences.english: After classification, about 60 percent of organic matter will be fermented and composted.
sentences.chinese: 分类后，约60%的有机物将进行发酵和堆肥。

sentences.english: Data processing of determination of heat of combustion in oxygen bomb by Microsoft Excel;
sentences.chinese: 对有机物燃烧热的测定方法进行了改进。

sentences.english: Half-life of radioactive element carbon-14 is 5730 year.
sentences.chinese: 用放射性同位素碳14测定有机物年龄的化学分析。

sentences.english: Heavy metals, cyanide, and toxic organics.
sentences.chinese: 重金属，氰化物和有毒有机物。

sentences.english: The quality of drinking water was poor mainly because of the organics contamination.
sentences.chinese: 生活饮用水水质较差，主要是受到有机物污染。
